objects.author: Merlord
objects.description: Ashfall is a survival, camping and needs mod.

objects.text:
begin ashfall_script_bedroll

short true
	set true to 1
short false
	set false to 0

short state
short button
short startsleep

short pickup
	set pickup to 110
short activated
	set activated to 100
short restMenu
	set restMenu to 150
short sleeping
	set sleeping to 5
short pressedSleep
	set pressedSleep to 10
short illegal
	set illegal to 20
short raining
	set raining to 30
short longSleep
	set longSleep to 40
short wellRested
	set wellRested to 50
short failedWellRested
	set failedWellRested to 60
short weatherEffects
	set weatherEffects to 70

float timeSlept
float smallIncrease
float largeIncrease

float time
short divXY
float modXY
;hasAbsorbMagicka workaround variables
short hasAbsorbMagicka
short attempts

short OnPCDrop
short height
set height to ( GetPos Z )
if ( OnPCDrop == true )
	set height to height - 37
	setPos Z height
	set OnPCDrop to false
endif


if ( state == pickup ) ; 
	Set state to false
	activate
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == true ) ;
	if ( MenuMode == true ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
		return
	endif
	MessageBox "Bedroll", "Sleep", "Pick up" "Do nothing"
	set state to activated	
endif

if ( state == activated )
	set button to GetButtonPressed
	;Keep doing nothing until button is pressed.
	if ( button == -1 ) ; 
		return
	elseif ( button == 0 ) 	
		if ( ashfall_sleep_illegal == 1 )
			set state to illegal
		else
			set state to pressedSleep
			set ashfall_using_bedroll to true ;tells global script we can sleep outside
			return
		endif
	elseif ( button == 1 ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
	else
		set state to 0
	endif

endif


if ( state == illegal )
	set state to 0
	MessageBox "Sleeping here is illegal" "Okay"
endif

if ( state == pressedSleep )
	ShowRestMenu
	set state to restMenu
endif

if ( state == restMenu )
	set ashfall_using_bedroll to true
	;Player chose rest
	if ( getPCSleep == true )
		set time to GameHour
		set state to sleeping
	;Player chose cancel
	elseif ( MenuMode == false )
		set ashfall_using_bedroll to false
		set state to 0
	endif	
endif


if ( state == sleeping )
;Wait until out of Rest menu AND no longer asleep
	if ( getPCSleep == false )
		if ( menuMode == false )
			set state to 0
			set ashfall_using_bedroll to false
		endif
	endif
endif

end

begin ashfall_script_cbroll_active

short true
	set true to 1
short false
	set false to 0

short state
short button
short startsleep
short OnPCDrop

short pickup
	set pickup to 110
short activated
	set activated to 100
short restMenu
	set restMenu to 150
short sleeping
	set sleeping to 5
short pressedSleep
	set pressedSleep to 10
short illegal
	set illegal to 20
short raining
	set raining to 30
short longSleep
	set longSleep to 40
short wellRested
	set wellRested to 50
short failedWellRested
	set failedWellRested to 60
short weatherEffects
	set weatherEffects to 70


float timeSlept
float smallIncrease
float largeIncrease

float time
short divXY
float modXY
;hasAbsorbMagicka workaround variables
short hasAbsorbMagicka
short attempts

short doOnce
short height
set height to getPos, Z
;if ( doOnce == false )
	;set doOnce to true
	;set height to height - 37
	;setPos, Z, height
	;set OnPCDrop to false
;endif

short state_to_delete
	set state_to_delete to 80

short wait
if ( state == state_to_delete )	
	if ( wait < 10 )
		set wait to wait + 1
	else	
		SetDelete 1	
	endif
endif

if ( state == pickup ) ; 
	PlaySound "Item Misc Up"
	Player->additem "ashfall_cbroll_misc" 1
	set a_inside_tent to false
	set state to state_to_delete
	Disable
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == true ) ;
	if ( MenuMode == true ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
		return
	endif
	MessageBox "Covered Bedroll", "Sleep", "Pick up" "Do nothing"
	set state to activated	
endif

if ( state == activated )
	set button to GetButtonPressed
	;Keep doing nothing until button is pressed.
	if ( button == -1 ) ; 
		return
	elseif ( button == 0 ) 	
		if ( ashfall_sleep_illegal == 1 )
			set state to illegal
		else
			set state to pressedSleep
		endif
	elseif ( button == 1 ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
	else
		set state to 0
	endif

endif


if ( state == illegal )
	set state to 0
	MessageBox "Sleeping here is illegal" "Okay"
endif

if ( state == pressedSleep )
	set a_inside_tent to true ;This bedroll is covered so you are "in a tent" while sleeping in it
	ShowRestMenu
	set state to restMenu
endif

if ( state == restMenu )
	;Player chose rest
	if ( getPCSleep == true )
		set time to GameHour
		set state to sleeping
	;Player chose cancel
	elseif ( MenuMode == false )
		set a_inside_tent to false
      set state to 0
	endif	
endif


if ( state == sleeping )
;Wait until out of Rest menu AND no longer asleep
	if ( getPCSleep == false )
		if ( menuMode == false )
			if ( GameHour < time );if passed to next day, set time back
				set time to time - 24
			endif
			float timeRested
			set timeRested to GameHour - time
			set state to 0
			set a_inside_tent to false
		endif
	endif
endif

end

begin ashfall_script_cbroll_misc

short OnPCDrop
short state
	short state_to_place
		set state_to_place to 10
	short state_to_disable
		set state_to_disable to 20
	short state_to_delete
		set state_to_delete to 30

short wait


if ( state == state_to_place )
	PlaceAtMe "ashfall_cbroll_active" 1 0 0
	Player->drop "ashfall_resetlight" 1
	set state to state_to_disable

elseif ( state == state_to_disable )
	set state to state_to_delete
	Disable

elseif ( state == state_to_delete )	
	if ( wait < 10 )
		set wait to wait + 1
	else	
		SetDelete 1	
	endif

else
	if ( OnPCDrop )
		set state to state_to_place
	endif

endif


End

begin ashfall_script_lightreset


if ( GetDisabled )
    SetDelete 1
else
	short ypos
	set ypos to GetPos Y
	if ( ypos != 0 )
		Disable
	endif
endif

End

begin ashfall_script_tent_active

short true
	set true to 1
short false
	set false to 0

short state
short button
short startsleep
short OnPCDrop

short pickup
	set pickup to 110
short activated
	set activated to 100
short restMenu
	set restMenu to 150
short sleeping
	set sleeping to 5
short pressedSleep
	set pressedSleep to 10
short illegal
	set illegal to 20
short raining
	set raining to 30
short longSleep
	set longSleep to 40
short wellRested
	set wellRested to 50
short failedWellRested
	set failedWellRested to 60
short weatherEffects
	set weatherEffects to 70


float timeSlept
float smallIncrease
float largeIncrease

float time
short divXY
float modXY
;hasAbsorbMagicka workaround variables
short hasAbsorbMagicka
short attempts

short doOnce
short height
set height to getPos, Z
;if ( doOnce == false )
	;set doOnce to true
	;set height to height - 37
	;setPos, Z, height
	;set OnPCDrop to false
;endif

short state_to_delete
	set state_to_delete to 80

short wait
if ( state == state_to_delete )	
	if ( wait < 10 )
		set wait to wait + 1
		
	else	
		set a_inside_tent to 0
		SetDelete 1	
	endif
	return
endif

if ( state == pickup ) ; 
	PlaySound "Item Misc Up"
	Player->additem "ashfall_tent_misc" 1
	set state to state_to_delete
	Disable
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == true ) ;
	if ( MenuMode == true ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
		return
	endif
	MessageBox "Canvas Tent", "Sleep", "Pick up" "Do nothing"
	set state to activated	
endif

if ( state == activated )
	set button to GetButtonPressed
	;Keep doing nothing until button is pressed.
	if ( button == -1 ) ; 
		return
	elseif ( button == 0 ) 	
		if ( ashfall_sleep_illegal == 1 )
			set state to illegal
		else
			set state to pressedSleep
		endif
	elseif ( button == 1 ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
	else
		set state to 0
	endif

endif


if ( state == illegal )
	set state to 0
	MessageBox "Sleeping here is illegal" "Okay"
endif

if ( state == pressedSleep )
	set a_inside_tent to true ;This bedroll is covered so you are "in a tent" while sleeping in it
	
	ShowRestMenu
	set state to restMenu
endif

if ( state == restMenu )
	;Player chose rest
	if ( getPCSleep == true )
		set time to GameHour
		set state to sleeping
	;Player chose cancel
	elseif ( MenuMode == false )
		set a_inside_tent to 0
      set state to 0
	endif	
endif


if ( state == sleeping )
;Wait until out of Rest menu AND no longer asleep
	if ( getPCSleep == false )
		if ( menuMode == false )
			if ( GameHour < time );if passed to next day, set time back
				set time to time - 24
			endif
			float timeRested
			set timeRested to GameHour - time
			set state to 0
			set a_inside_tent to 0
		endif
	endif
endif

	;Shelter player
	short tentRadius
	set tentRadius to 153
	if ( ( GetDistance, Player ) < tentRadius )
		if ( a_inside_tent == false )
			set a_inside_tent to true
			;//MessageBox "Inside Tent"
		endif
	else
		set a_inside_tent to false
	endif

end

begin ashfall_script_tent_ashl_active

short true
	set true to 1
short false
	set false to 0

short state
short button
short startsleep
short OnPCDrop

short pickup
	set pickup to 110
short activated
	set activated to 100
short restMenu
	set restMenu to 150
short sleeping
	set sleeping to 5
short pressedSleep
	set pressedSleep to 10
short illegal
	set illegal to 20
short raining
	set raining to 30
short longSleep
	set longSleep to 40
short wellRested
	set wellRested to 50
short failedWellRested
	set failedWellRested to 60
short weatherEffects
	set weatherEffects to 70


float timeSlept
float smallIncrease
float largeIncrease

float time
short divXY
float modXY
;hasAbsorbMagicka workaround variables
short hasAbsorbMagicka
short attempts

short doOnce
short height
set height to getPos, Z
;if ( doOnce == false )
	;set doOnce to true
	;set height to height - 37
	;setPos, Z, height
	;set OnPCDrop to false
;endif

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( GetSoundPlaying "chimes wood" == 0 )
		PlayLoopSound3DVP "chimes wood", 1.0, 1.0
	endif
endif

short state_to_delete
	set state_to_delete to 80

short wait
if ( state == state_to_delete )	
	if ( wait < 10 )
		set wait to wait + 1
		
	else	
		set a_inside_tent to 0
		SetDelete 1	
	endif
	return
endif

if ( state == pickup ) ; 
	PlaySound "Item Misc Up"
	Player->additem "ashfall_tent_ashl_misc" 1
	set state to state_to_delete
	Disable
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == true ) ;
	if ( MenuMode == true ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
		return
	endif
	MessageBox "Ashlander Tent", "Sleep", "Pick up" "Do nothing"
	set state to activated	
endif

if ( state == activated )
	set button to GetButtonPressed
	;Keep doing nothing until button is pressed.
	if ( button == -1 ) ; 
		return
	elseif ( button == 0 ) 	
		if ( ashfall_sleep_illegal == 1 )
			set state to illegal
		else
			set state to pressedSleep
		endif
	elseif ( button == 1 ) ; 
		Set state to pickup
	else
		set state to 0
	endif

endif


if ( state == illegal )
	set state to 0
	MessageBox "Sleeping here is illegal" "Okay"
endif

if ( state == pressedSleep )
	set a_inside_tent to true ;This bedroll is covered so you are "in a tent" while sleeping in it
	
	ShowRestMenu
	set state to restMenu
endif

if ( state == restMenu )
	;Player chose rest
	if ( getPCSleep == true )
		set time to GameHour
		set state to sleeping
	;Player chose cancel
	elseif ( MenuMode == false )
		set a_inside_tent to 0
      set state to 0
	endif	
endif


if ( state == sleeping )
;Wait until out of Rest menu AND no longer asleep
	if ( getPCSleep == false )
		if ( menuMode == false )
			if ( GameHour < time );if passed to next day, set time back
				set time to time - 24
			endif
			float timeRested
			set timeRested to GameHour - time
			set state to 0
			set a_inside_tent to 0
		endif
	endif
endif

	;Shelter player
	short tentRadius
	set tentRadius to 153
	if ( ( GetDistance, Player ) < tentRadius )
		if ( a_inside_tent == false )
			set a_inside_tent to true
			;//MessageBox "Inside Tent"
		endif
	else
		set a_inside_tent to false
	endif

end

begin ashfall_script_tent_ashl_misc

short OnPCDrop
short state
	short state_to_place
		set state_to_place to 10
	short state_to_disable
		set state_to_disable to 20
	short state_to_delete
		set state_to_delete to 30

if ( state == state_to_place )

elseif ( state == state_to_disable )
	set state to state_to_delete
	Disable

elseif ( state == state_to_delete )	
	if ( wait < 10 )
		set wait to wait + 1
	else	
		SetDelete 1	
	endif

else
	if ( OnPCDrop )
		set state to state_to_place
	endif

endif


End

short OnPCDrop

	short state_to_place

		set state_to_delete to 30

if ( state == state_to_place )

	Player->drop "ashfall_resetlight" 1

	set state to state_to_delete

	if ( wait < 10 )

	endif

else

		set state to state_to_place
	endif

objects.name: Ashfall: Grilling Guide
objects.text:
Grilling Guide


Grilling food increases its nutritional value. It also makes meat safe to eat, as eating it raw can give you food poisoning.
Attach a grill to a lit campfire, and directly place a piece of meat, vegetable or mushroom onto the grill to start cooking it. Wait until the food turns brown, then pick it up from the grill. Wait too long and the food will burn and turn black, which significantly reduces its nutrition value.
Your survival skill determines the time in between fully cooking and burning food.
